long_description: The Backpacker's Pantry 3-Day Meal kit serves 2 adults for 3 days, and has a 6-year shelf life so you can save it for emergencies or store it in your pantry for use on your next camping trip. Kit contains some of the most popular meals and desserts from Backpacker's Pantry; includes 3 breakfasts, 6 entrees and 3 desserts. For breakfast, you can enjoy Huevos Rancheros, Denver Omelet, or Granola with Bananas and Milk; Huevos Rancheros meal is gluten free. Fill up with a hearty dinner of Louisiana Red Beans and Rice, Katmandu Curry, Beef Stroganoff, Chili Mac with Beef, Jamaican Jerk Rice and Chicken, or Hawaiian Chicken. Louisiana Red Beans and Rice and Katmandu Curry are gluten free. End your day with a delicious desert; choose from Cheesecake, Hot Apple Cobbler or Mocha Mousse Pie. Backpacker's Pantry 3-Day Meal kit weighs 4 lbs. 6 oz. and measures 15 x 8 x 7.5 in. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The Backpacker's Pantry 3-Day Meal kit serves 2 adults for 3 days, and has a 6-year shelf life so you can save it for emergencies or store it in your pantry for use on your next camping trip.
